long_description: Honey Stinger Organic energy gel replaces essential electrolytes to keep you fueled for all your athletic endeavors. With organic tapioca syrup, organic honey and great-tasting flavors, this gel keeps your taste buds satisfied. Gel packets fit easily in your backpack or pocket. Choose from Vanilla, Fruit Smoothie and Acai Pomegranate flavors. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Honey Stinger Organic energy gel replaces essential electrolytes to keep you fueled for all your athletic endeavors.
